title: Timo Tolkki - Classical Variations and Themes (1994)
description:
Classical Variations And Themes is Stratovarius guitarist Timo Tolkki&#039;s 1994, neo-classically flavored, melodic metal solo outing.
An 11 track collection (9 instrumental, 2 vocal) of classical variations and themes, it includes Tolkki&#039;s interpretation of Tchaikovsky&#039;s "Death Of A Swan", as well as Rodrigo&#039;s "Concierto De Aranjuez" ("Guitar Concerto") and the traditional tune "Greensleeves". Tolkki provides the vocals on a pair of vocal tracks, and interestingly, decided to give up the vocal chair in Stratovarius shortly after - in order to concentrate on guitar.
Tracklist:
1. Lord Of The Rings 5.42
2. Fire Dance Suite 4.58
3. Guitar Concerto 2.52
4. Northern Lights 2.18
5. Capriccio In A Minor 1.09
6. Back To The Ice Age 4.04
7. Death Of A Swan 3.54
8. Soldiers Prayer 4.05
9. Flying Samir 3.02
10. Sunwinds 2.41
11. Greensleeves 1.53
